    def vector(self, doc):
        tokens = self._tokenise(doc)
        tf_raw = self._tf(tokens)
        vec, denom = {}, max(len(tokens), 1)
        for tok, freq in tf_raw.items():
            tf = freq / denom
            idf = math.log((self.doc_cnt + 1) / (self.df.get(tok, 0) + 1)) + 1
            vec[tok] = tf * idf
        return vec

    @staticmethod
    def cosine(a, b):
        common = set(a) & set(b)
        dot = sum(a[t]*b[t] for t in common)
